Pre-Game Insights: Jason Holder expressed a bittersweet feeling about Barbados-born Jacob Bethell playing for England.
Bethell is set to play against the West Indies during England's white-ball tour.
Holder mentioned that the West Indies have 'no fear' ahead of the upcoming white-ball tour against England.
Liam Livingstone will lead England during the ODI leg of the tour as Jos Buttler continues his recovery from a calf injury.
